generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.
generic_options.help_text:
These options are common to all nf-core pipelines and allow you to customise some of the core preferences for how the pipeline runs.

Typically these options would be set in a Nextflow config file loaded for all pipeline runs, such as `~/.nextflow/config`.

mappings.description: Path to the mappings CSV file, with columns "id" and "raw_counts_matrix".

annotations.description: Path to the annotations TSV file, with columns "id", "cell", and the annotation column (set by --annotation_col, default: "celltype").

gene_order_file.description: Path to the headerless gene order TSV file, with columns "gene", "chr", "start", "stop". See the inferCNV wiki for details.

annotation_col.description: Column of the annotations file to use for defining groups of cells.

analysis_mode.description: Analysis mode used to run inferCNV.

cluster_by_groups.description: Cluster inferCNV output by groups, according to their annotations?
